sentence.Network_en: Sounds of voices and commotion could be heard downstairs now.

sentence.Network_en: I heard a commotion and went to see what was happening.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到一阵喧闹便去看看发生了什么事情。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin commotio(n-), from com- 'altogether' + motio (see motion)

entry.def: A commotion is a lot of noise, confusion, and excitement.

example.ex: Sounds of voices and commotion could be heard downstairs now.
example.tran: 现在能听见楼下人声鼎沸。

sentences.sentence: "they were amazed by the furious disturbance they had caused"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of making a noisy disturbance

sentences.sentence: "he was caught up in a whirl of work"
"a commotion of people fought for the exits"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It stops all the commotion and it makes sense.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mot运动+ive……的→n.动机,目的 adj.发动的,运动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 远的,遥远的,疏远的,偏僻的,细微的
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+mot运动+e→动回去→退回去→遥远的
com共同+motion动→大家一起动→动乱
mot运动+ion表名词→n.运动,动;提议,动议
mot运动+ive……的→n.动机,目的 adj.发动的,运动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发动机, 电动机,汽车
stems_affixes.word_buile: mot运动+or物器→n.发动机, 电动机,汽车
motor汽车+cycle=cycl圆,环→圆,环[轮胎]占大部分的车→摩托车, 机车
promote[v.促进;提升]+ion表名词→n.促进;提升;创立

stems_affixes.value_cn: [美口]夸张地作为, 表现感情
促动;激励,鼓励,作为……的动机
stems_affixes.word_buile: motive动机,目的+ate表动词→motivate使有动机→推动

means.word_mean: 混乱, 喧闹, 骚动

sentences.en: They made a commotion by yelling at each other in the theatre.
sentences.cn: 他们在剧院里相互争吵, 引起了一阵骚乱。

jushi.english: They made a commotion by yelling at each other in the theatre.
jushi.chinese: 他们在剧院里相互争吵，引起了一阵骚乱。

jushi.english: Eighteen years of commotion had made the majority of the people ready to buy repose at any price.
jushi.chinese: 十八年的动荡使大多数人都准备不惜一切代价来赢得安宁。
